item.description:
Lets meet for a early movie and then head over to cheers for a drink and/or dinner. There are several good movies playing at this theater.

About Cheers:
Did you know that the executive producer of the Cheers TV series was originally going to have the show based on a Philadelphia pub. But... when he game to Boston to visit his son who was attending MIT, he serendipitously stepped into Cheers one night. The people inside were so interesting and friendly that after that weekend in Boston, he decided to based the TV series on the Boston pub instead of one in Philly.
item.how_to_find_us: I will hangout in front of the movie theater.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Early movie: The Reader & afterward dinner at Cheers.
